text:
Hello all! Hope your week is starting well!

Quick question, have someone worked with retrieving the information of inMails in HubSpot?
I understand that in this cases the native connection don't allow to update the activity related to inMails and that a Zapier could be a solution.
Just wondering if someone else has done it in the past?
and if I will have to create a form for this in HS to add to my Zap? :eyes:

Many thanks in afvance!
When I try to connect my domain with HubSpot you are asking to replace the cname and A records, I'm curious if i have changed my DNS records then how does the DNS resolve to my Application server IP

Reminder: Did you know you can message <@U02162GK9SP|sprocky> at any time to get HubSpot development questions answered? It’s an experimental chat bot built to tackle developer questions. It won’t read your code, but can answer a lot of questions about building on the HubSpot platform.
Hey Kyle - out of curiosity how did you sign up for a sandbox? We're trying to get one haha

Hello, I am a front end developer, I am new here. 

I have started studying HubSpot CMS, I already have the files locally to develop a theme and everything is new.  any advice?
